description: Is a unified way to add content to Kaltura whether it's an uploaded file, webcam recording, imported URL or existing file sync.
Used to ingest media that is available on remote server and accessible using the supplied URL, media file will be downloaded using import job in order to make the asset ready.

properties.name: url
properties.description: Remote URL, FTP, HTTP or HTTPS

properties.name: forceAsyncDownload
properties.description: Force Import Job

description: Used to ingest media that is available on remote server and accessible using the supplied URL, the media file won't be downloaded but a file sync object of URL type will point to the media URL.

properties.name: url
properties.description: Remote URL, FTP, HTTP or HTTPS

properties.name: forceAsyncDownload
properties.description: Force Import Job

properties.name: storageProfileId
properties.description: ID of storage profile to be associated with the created file sync, used for file serving URL composing.

description: Used to ingest media that is available on remote SSH server and accessible using the supplied URL, media file will be downloaded using import job in order to make the asset ready.

properties.name: url
properties.description: Remote URL, FTP, HTTP or HTTPS

properties.name: forceAsyncDownload
properties.description: Force Import Job

properties.name: privateKey
properties.description: SSH private key

properties.name: publicKey
properties.description: SSH public key

properties.name: keyPassphrase
properties.description: Passphrase for SSH keys

description: Used to ingest media that dropped through drop folder

properties.name: dropFolderFileId
properties.description: Id of the drop folder file object

description: Used to ingest media file that is already accessible on the shared disc.

properties.name: localFilePath
properties.description: Full path to the local file

description: sed to ingest media that uploaded as posted file in this http request, the file data represents the $_FILE

properties.name: fileData
properties.description: Represents the $_FILE

description: Used to ingest media that uploaded to the system and represented by token that returned from upload.upload action or uploadToken.add action.

properties.name: token
properties.description: Token that returned from upload.upload action or uploadToken.add action.

description: Used to ingest media that streamed to the system and represented by token that returned from media server such as FMS or red5.

properties.name: token
properties.description: Token that returned from media server such as FMS or red5.

description: Used to ingest media that is already ingested to Kaltura system as a different flavor asset in the past, the new created flavor asset will be ready immediately using a file sync of link type that will point to the existing file sync of the existing flavor asset.

properties.name: assetId
properties.description: ID of the source asset

description: Used to ingest media that is already ingested to Kaltura system as a different entry in the past, the new created flavor asset will be ready immediately using a file sync of link type that will point to the existing file sync of the existing entry.

properties.name: entryId
properties.description: ID of the source entry

properties.name: flavorParamsId
properties.description: ID of the source flavor params, set to null to use the source flavor

description: Used to ingest media that is already ingested to Kaltura system as a different file in the past, the new created flavor asset will be ready immediately using a file sync of link type that will point to the existing file sync.

properties.name: fileSyncObjectType
properties.description: The object type of the file sync object

properties.name: objectSubType
properties.description: The object sub-type of the file sync object

properties.name: objectId
properties.description: The object id of the file sync object

properties.name: version
properties.description: The version of the file sync object

description: A resource that perform operation (transcoding, clipping, cropping) before the flavor is ready.

properties.name: resource
properties.description: Only KalturaEntryResource and KalturaAssetResource are supported

arrayType.description: Base class to all operation attributes types

properties.name: assetParamsId
properties.description: ID of alternative asset params to be used instead of the system default flavor params

description: Used to ingest media that is available on remote server and accessible using the supplied URL, the media file won't be downloaded but a file sync object of URL type will point to the media URL.

properties.name: resources
properties.description: Array of remote stoage resources

arrayType.description: Used to ingest media that is available on remote server and accessible using the supplied URL, the media file won't be downloaded but a file sync object of URL type will point to the media URL.

properties.name: url
properties.description: Remote URL, FTP, HTTP or HTTPS

properties.name: forceAsyncDownload
properties.description: Force Import Job

properties.name: storageProfileId
properties.description: ID of storage profile to be associated with the created file sync, used for file serving URL composing.

properties.name: content
properties.description: Textual content

properties.name: resource
properties.description: The content resource to associate with asset params

properties.name: assetParamsId
properties.description: The asset params to associate with the reaource

properties.name: resources
properties.description: Array of resources associated with asset params ids

properties.name: resource
properties.description: The content resource to associate with asset params

properties.name: assetParamsId
properties.description: The asset params to associate with the reaource
